title: African immigrant says Italian politics built on "witch-hunts and hatred towards migrants"
text:
African immigrant says Italian politics built on "witch-hunts and hatred towards migrants" 6:56pm GMT - 01:37 
African immigrants said on Friday they want to see an end to the language of hate they say Italian political parties are encouraging following national elections. Michelle Hennessy reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
African immigrants said on Friday they want to see an end to the language of hate they say Italian political parties are encouraging following national elections.
